channel.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2
channel.description:
I'm taking my partner to the cinema tonight, and I'm not sure if I should watch super 8 or Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2. Both trailers look interesting so it's a hard decision.
What do you think about Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2 and for those who have seen Super 8 could they compare?

item.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:17, topic:408383”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=509666.msg3698745#msg3698745 date=1312603746]

You people are idiots. Saphire is a guy. Partner=fiance(lol idk how to spell it)

Are you sure? Because i remember somewere seeing saphire was a girl…
[/quote]I have him on MSN. He even posted his picture.[/quote]
Well in that case, back to the movie topic :o

Read full topic
